Donuts

Sold by the dozen · Made FRESH TO ORDER

We make all donuts to order. Please contact us for availability, custom requests, or rush orders.

Note: Donuts are best served the day they're made — order for same-day pickup or scheduled delivery.

Donut Types

Fried Cake Donuts

  • Vanilla
  • Chocolate
  • Red Velvet
  • Apple Cider

Traditional Yeast

  • Ring
  • Filled+

Frostings and Toppings

Traditional Glaze Frostings

  • Vanilla
  • Chocolate
  • Strawberry
  • Raspberry
  • Maple
  • Salted Caramel

Sugars / Toppings

  • Cinnamon
  • Spiced Sugar
  • Strawberry Sugar
  • Raspberry Sugar
  • Powdered Sugar

Additional Toppings+

  • Sprinkles++
  • Glaze striping
  • Oreo crumbles
  • Bacon crumbles+
  • Toffee bits+

Fillings

We offer fruit preserves and other fillings — other fillings may be available upon request.

  • Strawberry
  • Raspberry
  • Blackberry
  • Peach
  • Cherry

Pricing

Pricing is per dozen. Special toppings/fillings may have additional charges. Please contact us for specific pricing.

Item Price (per dozen)
Cake or Yeast Ring Shaped Donuts $30
Filled Yeast Donuts $33
Mini Donuts +++ (2 dozen minimum) $17

+ Additional charges may apply.
++ Donuts can be topped with in-stock rainbow sprinkles at no additional cost. Custom sprinkles/cereals are subject to availability and may require advanced notice. We are a nut-free bakery — nut-free sprinkles/cereals can be difficult to source in specific colors/types; we will do our best with advanced notice.
+++ 2 dozen minimum purchase for mini donuts unless your order already includes regular size donuts.
